Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.name: drawCell(in:)
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.abstract: Fully renders content of cell, representing a specific day. Default implementation calls drawCellBackground (in:) and drawCellTitle (in:), in that order.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.name: drawCellBackground(in:)
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.abstract: Renders background of a day cell. Default implementation calls drawCellBackground (state:color:frame:in:) with corresponding values of context.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.name: drawCellTitle(in:)
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.abstract: Renders title of a day cell. Default implementation calls drawCellTitle (title:attributes:frame:in:) with corresponding values of context.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.name: drawCellBackground(state:color:frame:in:)
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.abstract: Default implementation of day cell background drawing. Fills frame of context with color if state != CPCDayCellState.normal.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.name: drawCellTitle(title:attributes:frame:in:)
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.abstract: Default implementation of day cell title drawing. Renders title with attributes in frame of context.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderingContext.htm.name: graphicsContext
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderingContext.htm.abstract: Graphical context that should be used for custom drawing.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderingContext.htm.name: day
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderingContext.htm.abstract: Day that is represented by the cell.

Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..name: normal
Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..abstract: Normal state of a day cell (not selected, highlighted or disabled).

Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..name: highlighted
Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..abstract: Highlighted state of a cell (current user touch is inside cell’s bounds).

Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..name: selected
Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..abstract: Selected state of a cell (cell is part of current selection).

Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..name: disabled
Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..abstract: Disabled state of a cell (cell is displayed but cannot be a part of selection).

Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..name: BackgroundState
Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..abstract: State of a cell that is assigned due to user actions.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.name: isToday
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.abstract: State part, indicating that cell is rendering current day.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.name: init(backgroundState:isToday:)
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.abstract: Creates a new cell state from state items.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.name: normal
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.abstract: Normal state of a cell that renders any day except current.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.name: highlighted
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.abstract: Highlighted state of a cell that renders any day except current.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.name: selected
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.abstract: Selected state of a cell that renders any day except current.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.name: disabled
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.abstract: Disabled state of a cell that renders any day except current.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.name: today
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.abstract: Normal state of a cell that renders current day.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.name: cState
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.abstract: CPCDayCellState Objective C value, equivalent to this CPCDayCellState value.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.name: init(_:)
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:14Crispy.abstract: Creates new CPCDayCellState equivalent to a CPCDayCellState Objective C value.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.name: short
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Short title format: one-digit month number and full year.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.name: medium
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Medium title format: two-digit zero-padded month number and full year.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.name: long
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Long title format: abbreviated month name and full year.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.name: full
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Full title format: full month name and full year.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.name: default
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Default month title format, which is used when no format was explicitly set.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.name: customTemplate(_:)
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Create a new month title format using date format template for current locale.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.name: customTemplate(_:locale:)
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Create a new month title format using date format template.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.name: custom(_:)
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Create a new month title format using exact date format.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.name: init(stringLiteral:)
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Creates a new month title format from a string literal.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.name: init(templateValue:)
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Create a new month title format using date format template for current locale.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Create a new month title format using date format template.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html.name: CPCViewTitleStyle
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html.abstract: A value that holds information about formatting month titles.

Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.name: single(_:)
Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.abstract: Single day selection mode; associated value holds currently selected day or nil if selection is empty.

Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.name: range(_:)
Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.abstract: Range of dates selection mode; associated value holds currently selected days range (possibly empty).

Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.name: unordered(_:)
Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.abstract: Arbitrary set of dates selection mode; associated value holds unordered collection of selected dates (possibly empty).

Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.name: ordered(_:)
Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.abstract: Arbitrary array of dates selection mode; associated value holds collection of selected dates (possibly empty) ordered the same way that user did pick them.

Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.name: isDaySelected(_:)
Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.abstract: Check whether a day is selected given all selected days.

Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.name: isEmpty
Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the selection does not contain any day.

Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.name: difference(_:)
Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.abstract: Returns set of days contained by exactly one of given selection values.

Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.name: clamped(to:)
Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.abstract: Returns a subset of this selection that contains days matching sepcified date constraints.
Forms union of two values and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.
Forms union of two values and returns it leaving otriginal values unchanged.
Subtracts from the first value days that are selected byn the second one and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.
Calculates selection that contains all of the left-hand-side days except those contained in right-hand-side one and returns it leaving original unchanged.

Enums/CPCViewSelection.html.name: CPCViewSelection
Enums/CPCViewSelection.html.abstract: A value that describes view selection mode and currently selected days simultaneously.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: dayCellBackgroundColor(for:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Returns the day cell background color used for a state.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: setDayCellBackgroundColor(_:for:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Sets the background color of the day cell to use for the specified state.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: See CPCDayCellRenderer.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: allowsSelection
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Boolean flag indicating whether selection may be extended by user.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: select(_:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Appends a single day to the specified selection.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: select(_:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Appends a range of cosecutive days to the specified selection.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: select(_:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Appends a range of cosecutive days to the specified selection.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: select(_:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Appends days contained withing given collection to the specified selection.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: select(_:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Appends days from given collection to the specified selection.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: select(_:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Appends days from given collection to the specified selection.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: deselect(_:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Removes a single day from the specified selection.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: deselect(_:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Removes a consecutive range of days from the specified selection.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: deselect(_:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Removes a consecutive range of days from the specified selection.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: deselect(_:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Removes a consecutive range of days from the specified selection.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: deselect(_:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Removes days from given collection from the specified selection.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: deselect(_:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Removes days from given collection from the specified selection.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html.name: CPCViewProtocol
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html.abstract: Views conforming to this protocol perform rendering of calendar cells

Protocols/CPCViewLayoutAttributes.html.name: CPCViewLayoutAttributes
Protocols/CPCViewLayoutAttributes.html.abstract: A type that can be used to calculate size of a view conforming to CPCViewMeasuring

Protocols/CPCViewMeasuring.html.name: CPCViewMeasuring
Protocols/CPCViewMeasuring.html.abstract: A view type that is capable of calculating fitting size for instances staticslly.

Protocols/CPCFixedAspectRatioView.html.name: CPCFixedAspectRatioView
Protocols/CPCFixedAspectRatioView.html.abstract: A view type that sizes instances using linear equation.

Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.name: normal
Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.abstract: Full localized name of a calendar unit.

Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.name: short
Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.abstract: Shortened localized name of calendar unit. Usually consists of just several letters.

Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.name: veryShort
Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.abstract: The very shortest localized name for a calendar unit. Usually contains just a single letter.

Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.name: default
Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.abstract: Default symbol style that is used when no specific style is requested.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html#/s:.abstract: Get a localized name of a calendar unit.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html#/s:.abstract: Get a localized name of a calendar unit.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html#/s:.abstract: Get a localized name of a calendar unit.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html#/s:.name: symbol(style:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html#/s:.abstract: Get a localized name of a calendar unit.

Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.name: init(_:)
Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.abstract: Creates a new date interval that is equivalent to another one.

Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.name: init(_:)
Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.abstract: Creates a new date interval that is equivalent to another one.

Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.name: clamped(to:)
Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.abstract: Returns a copy of this date interval clamped to the given limiting date interval.

Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.name: clamped(to:)
Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.abstract: Returns a copy of this date interval clamped to the given limiting date interval.

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.name: start
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Earliest date that is included in date interval.

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.name: end
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Earliest date that is not included in date interval and is later than start (analogous to Range <Date>.upperBound).

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.name: duration
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Duration of date interval. Default implementation returns self.end.timeIntervalSice (self.start).

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.name: contains(_:)
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether this date interval is fully contained or is equal to the given range.

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.name: contains(_:)
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether this date interval is fully contained or is equal to the given range.

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.name: prev
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Previous interval (an interval that has the same duration and ends when this interval starts).

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.name: next
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Next interval (an interval that has the same duration and starts when this interval ends).

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html.name: CPCDateInterval
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html.abstract: Common protocol for types representing an arbitrary range of dates.

Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.name: CPCDateIntervalInitializable
Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.abstract: Common protocol for types that can be initialized with a date interval.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html.name: CPCCalendarUnitSymbol
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html.abstract: Calendar unit that has a localizable symbol in addition to an integer value.

Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html.name: CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle
Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html.abstract: Represents style of a localized string representing a calendar unit.

Structs/CPCDay.html.name: CPCDay
Structs/CPCDay.html.abstract: Calendar unit that repsesents a single day.
